name: Twisted Tapenade Olives

ingredients.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix or Italian Seasoning

preparation: In bowl, toss together all ingredients. Let marinate at least 1 hour or overnight. Serve warm (see tip) or at room temperature.
tips: Before serving, bring out the aromatic flavour by microwaving olives, on high, until warm, about 45 seconds.

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: A classic for a reason, this dressing mix is full of flavour and uber versatile. Use it as salad or nourish bowl dressing, marinade protein including chicken and beef, or glaze grilled veggies and fresh fruit. Any way you serve it, itâ€™s sure to be a hit!

products.name: Italian Seasoning
summary: A robust Italian blend perfect for pizza, bread dough, pasta or flatbreads.
